metadata.title: CVE-2019-16746 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in net/wireless/nl80211.c in the Linux kernelthrough 5.2.17. It does not check the length of variable elements in abeacon head, leading to a buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
